talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
Hehe... Alright. Let's just leave you out of it, then.
Anyway, I'm going to get some supplies and then pay a visit to the conference room.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
I'm sure they'll all be there waiting.

$Norfe$
Oh, welcome.
This is a first… seeing you here.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
… So it was you all along. I had a feeling you were connected to the lord of Rhadames somehow or other.
You were indeed quite extraordinary.

${user_nick}$
Hey, you guys know each other?
(What the-? Was I the only one in the dark?)

$Norfe$
Yes, we received his help a great deal in Red Lotus Palace…
But I was unaware you two were connected as well, {user_nick}.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
Nor was I aware of your mutual acquaintance…

${user_nick}$
(What's this...? Why are they both acting like they know something?
Why are they looking at me?)

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
Thank you again for everything in Red Lotus Palace.
As the leader of the Blue Clan, I look forward to returning the favor to Rhadames.

$Norfe$
It was us that is indebted. You came to us like a knight in shining armor when we needed it most.
Now then, I believe everyone else knows each other, except one...

$Norfe$
This is Princess Sylvania of Aergal Kingdom.
The people of Aergal have common cause with Rhadames.

$Princess Sylvania$
I heard much about the Blue Clan. It's just like what happened to Aergal…
Ahem... Well, whatever, let's help each other through this!

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
Thank you. We will put our best foot forward if there is anything we can do to help.

$Norfe$
Kali, welcome.
Everyone else is acquainted with Ultima. You two know each as well, I believe?

$Kali$
We do. Then, are the introductions complete?

$Norfe$
Indeed, then I suppose we can begin discussing a plan for the days ahead now that even the Blue Clan and Aergal have joined us.
With that in mind…

$Norfe$
I have been looking into what Hiver said earlier.
Whether her story about the 'Red Child' is true.

$ Kali $
……!!

$Norfe$
There are several refugees who witnessed the first attack.
And… (Norfe's face darkens.) Their testimony about the red flames lines up.

$Norfe$
There were even those who suddenly saw giant red wings unfold when the roof opened to expose the sky that day.
However, there was no talk of a Child with red hair or wings witnessed during the attack on the city.

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9941_sp_01.ogg}
It would seem the Red Child destroyed the roof of Aergal and then left.
Either way, it is appears to be true that he was involved in the attack of the city.

$Princess Sylvania$
So, am I understanding this correctly?
It was Rubinart, the Red Child, who attacked Aergal?

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
Yes, it would seem so. I had the same experience.
He came suddenly, attacked, and left just as quickly.

${user_nick}$
(Rubinart… The Blue Clan was attacked at the behest of Hwaran. Does that mean Aergal was too?)

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9941_sp_01.ogg}
This is unforgivable!
Red Child… In the name of Aergal, I will have my revenge!

$Kali${sound:npc_Kali_qu9952_sp_01.ogg}
Hang on, wait a minute. Settle down! Please… Just think about this for a second.
Rubinart, the Red Child, would never do such a thing!

$Norfe$
Kali…

$Kali${sound:npc_Kali_qu9952_sp_02.ogg}
You know this, Norfe! Rubinart has been corrupted by Goddess Vestinel's poison.
The real Rubinart was completely different! He helped the Anti-Goddess Faction and saved the people of Mistland!

$Kali${sound:npc_Kali_qu9952_sp_03.ogg}
This is all because of the Goddess.
He became the 'Red Child' and is not of right mind.

${user_nick}$
(She's right, but… it's not going to change the minds of those who lost family members as a result…)

$Blue Phoenix Ultima${sound:npc_Mugeuk_qu9941_sp_01.ogg}
He is no different from the other Childs in that respect.

$Kali$
…! B-, but…

$Blue Phoenix Ultima${sound:npc_Mugeuk_qu9941_sp_02.ogg}
They were not like that in the beginning. They were all someone's family.

$Grele$
……

$Kali$
(Kali appears to be in anguish.)

$Princess Sylvania$
Ugh… It is so tense in here… What you say is true, and I completely agree, but…
I really hate when things get so heavy like this…

$Princess Sylvania$
Anyway, you're right, Ultima. And yet… I understand where Kali is coming from.
Rubinart was a dear comrade of ours in the Secret Passage, so we cannot simply oppose him based purely on what Hiver said, can we?

$Princess Sylvania$
I heard all about 'Rubinart' from before.
The outrageously handsome and dashing man with red hair who secretly assisted the Anti-Goddess Faction.

$Ultima$
… Hand…some?

${user_nick}$
Uh, is that really important right now? Aren't we talking about the fate of your kingdom?

$Princess Sylvania$
Yes, it's important! That's what helped me remember him, the fact that he was outrageously handsome!
It was the Rubinart who helped the Anti-Goddess Faction.

$Princess Sylvania$
So even if he became the 'Red Child' because of the Goddess, Kali might still hold out hope.
As I've experienced firsthand, Kali is always willing to give the benefit of the doubt.

$Norfe$
It's true that Kali is never one to give up hope.
The fact that you figured out that much… suggests Aergal's information network was quite impressive indeed.

$Princess Sylvania$
No need to speak in the past tense is there? Anyway, what I'm saying is simple.
I agree that Rubinart was your comrade and helped the Anti-Goddess Faction out a great deal.

$Princess Sylvania$
Even though the 'Red Child' destroyed my kingdom, it doesn't change that fact.
What I mean to say is, I still want to help you out. Okay?

$ Kali $
……!!

$Princess Sylvania$
Ugh, why so surprised? You know full well how much the people of Aergal owe you!
We'll help you figure out how to use the Cup of Healing and fight Hiver. Okay? I hope you're grateful!

$Kali$
Thank you. Really… Thank you so much!

$Princess Sylvania$
You can thank me later, when the job is done.
Just promise me one thing.

$Kali$
A promise?

$Princess Sylvania$
I will have my revenge on the Red Child.
Don't try to stop me. Well, can you manage that?

$Kali$
Huh?!

$Princess Sylvania$
What, did you really think I'd be like, 'He was a nice guy before, so no worries! We're all friends here'?
'Rubinart' used to be kind, sure, but that 'Red Child' is the mortal enemy of my family and people.

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9941_sp_02.ogg}
Rubinart gets what he deserves, and the Red Child gets what he has coming.
I am more than happy to differentiate between the two. As long as you promise not to get in the way of my revenge. Well, how about it?

$Norfe$
I see. I understand your intentions, Princess.

$Kali$
Norfe, you don't mean…

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9941_sp_02.ogg}
(Norfe's face darkens.)
Too many have died as it is.
What's done cannot be undone. I can't say I'll stop the Princess when the time comes.

$Kali${sound:npc_Kali_qu9952_sp_04.ogg}
But… It's Rubinart. How could we? We're the Anti-Goddess Faction! How could we turn our backs on Rubinart?!

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9941_sp_03.ogg}
Indeed, if it weren't for Rubinart, we'd have…
We owe Rubinart a debt of gratitude we can never repay. It is true.

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9941_sp_04.ogg}
(Norfe unconsciously touches the device on his forehead.)
And yet… we must adapt to the world as it is, Kali.

$Norfe$
The Childs... We know full well what happens to someone who has turned into a Child.
The 'Red Child'… It could be anyone.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima${sound:npc_Mugeuk_qu9941_sp_03.ogg}
To state the obvious, it is the Goddess who is to blame. The Goddess has made them all that way.
The tragedy of the Blue Clan, the death of Aergal... It's all the work of Vestinel.

$Kali$
Ultima!

$Blue Phoenix Ultima${sound:npc_Mugeuk_qu9941_sp_04.ogg}
…That said, I understand where the Princess is coming from.
I can't judge her decision because I too have my own irrepressible desire for revenge.

$Geraint$
You guys… You guys!

$Geraint${sound:npc_GereintKid_qu9941_sp_01.ogg}
Think about why Rubinart became corrupted like that in the first place!
Why he used up all his strength here in this… this land filled with poison!

$Geraint${sound:npc_GereintKid_qu9941_sp_02.ogg}
It was for you guys! If you had left the Goddess alone,
he may not have become the Red Child!

$Geraint${sound:npc_GereintKid_qu9941_sp_03.ogg}
Now I know what it means when they say there are no good people left. You... Have you no shame?

$Kali$
Geraint! Just calm down for a minute… Once we talk this through everyone will underst-...

$Geraint${sound:npc_GereintKid_qu9941_sp_04.ogg}
Who are you asking to calm down? You look like you're going to cry!
You should be getting angry at these miscreants!

$ Kali $
……!!

$Geraint$
This is ridiculous. Enough! I hate you all!!!

${user_nick}$
Damn, he just ran off. I get it though.
He's lost everything, including his family and country.

$Kali$
Geraint …

${user_nick}$
You worried about him? I know how you feel, so go ahead. He didn't say anything wrong,
and everyone here is willing to wait. Right?

$Norfe$
Indeed. You should go to Geraint.
... Kali, I am sorry.

${user_nick}$
Oh my, was that an apology from the sliest old fox?
Better get going. We'll be waiting here. Surely everyone is willing to do that much, right?
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Back to the Conference Room
journal.contents:
Ultima, who just arrived, looked more energetic than when you last met. But planning to steal the world from the Goddess' grasp might be a tad... overzealous. It seems it's time to return to the conference room.

Rhadames - Norfe

journal.title: Those Set On Revenge
journal.contents:
After exchanging greetings, a dark discussion begins in earnest. Apparently Rubinart, the Red Child, really was behind the attack on Aergal Kingdom. The Princess begins to have her say.

Rhadames - Princess Sylvania
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Princess Sylvania in Rhadames

journal.title: Unacceptable Conditions
journal.contents:
Kali tries to dissuade the Princess, who is intent on seeking revenge against Rubinart. But is that even possible to begin with?

Rhadames - Princess Sylvania
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Princess Sylvania in Rhadames
journal.todo_msg: Princess Sylvania sighs and resumes speaking.

journal.title: Dagger Over Our Heads
journal.contents:
Princess Sylvania promised to assist the Anti-Goddess Faction and help determine how to use the Cup of Healing. Her only request in return is that you don't interfere when she seeks vengeance against the Red Child. Kali appears to be in shock. As she calms down, Norfe begins to speak.

Rhadames - Norfe
journal.todo_msg: Norfe seems to have something to say.

journal.title: The Raven's Declaration
journal.contents:
Norfe says what's done cannot be undone. Kali's face turns pale. Now it seems Ultima has something to say.

Rhadames - Blue Phoenix Ultima
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Blue Phoenix Ultima in Rhadames

journal.title: Furious Boy
journal.contents:
With no one taking Rubinart's side, Geraint stares at Kali with an enraged expression.

Rhadames - Geraint

journal.title: Impact
journal.contents:
Geraint shouted with all his might and then ran off somewhere. Kali seems not to know whether to go after him or stay. You should help her out by asking Norfe to stop the meeting.

Rhadames - Norfe
